thread.section_title: Hotel Baume - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect stay in Paris
thread.title_full: Perfect stay in Paris - Review of Hotel Baume, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ssfox90
title: Perfect stay in Paris
text: The hotel is in a great location and close to the 4 metro which takes you straight to gare du Nord. The hotel reception is lovely and the room was decorated beautifully with an excellent shower and comfortable bed. The staff were so friendly and helpful and the breakfast was absolutely delicious.
